txt.en: 'If the Enemy has word of our passage, I am certain it is carried by Warg-riding message-bearers. We surprised one yesterday morn, and it bore some foul black scratching on some parchment, the meaning of which I could not fathom.\n\n'If you should espy any of these Warg-riders behind us in the Beacon Hills, I implore you to stop them, lest our force should be found out.'
You should defeat any Warg-rider message-bearers you find in the Beacon Hills.
Return to Déorwine in the camp in Taur Drúadan and tell him of the Warg-rider message-bearers you defeated.
'You have defeated many of those cursed message-bearers, then? Good. Perhaps we shall make it to the field of battle undetected. My thanks, [placeholder].'
Find and defeat Warg-rider message bearers in the Beacon Hills.
